channel.title: Perpendicular on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Perpendicular on Let's see what happens.

item.title: City (Lights)
item.description: On a crossroads if lights show me green before I get there - I skip this turn regardless of how much time is there. It doesn’t sound like a “herd behavior” on one hand. But unusually this leads to me crossing the road with a crowd on every crossroads this way. Anyway if it shows me green, instead I go check the newspapers I never check or I find something interesting.
